name: Nikhil Dabas
body:
### Hi, I'm Nik.
Find me on [Twitter](http://twitter.com/ndabas), [GitHub](http://github.com/ndabas), or [LinkedIn](http://in.linkedin.com/in/ndabas).

### Projects
- [FreshBing](http://github.com/ndabas/FreshBing): A simple, unobtrusive script to update your wallpaper daily, downloaded fresh from the Bing images feed.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
